promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive simple goat fire-type pokemon wearing orange and black gemstones. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or goat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Pyroceros, a a massive simple goat fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Flame Tail, Odor Sleuth. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "goat", "fire" or "Pyroceros". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, goat-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: A wild inhabitant of vast sandscapes, Pyroceros wields a blazing tail. It uses Odor Sleuth for tracking, lighting the night with inferno.
